result.eng: We were exhausted by the time we reached the town.
result.ga: Bhí muid traochta faoin am a shroich muid an baile
result.orig: Bhí muid traochta faoin am a shroich muid an baile
result.html: Bhí muid traochta faoin am a shroich muid an baileWe were exhausted by the time we reached the town.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid traoċta faoin am a ẛroiċ muid an baileWe were exhausted by the time we reached the town.

result.eng: What is that town called?
result.ga: Cén t-ainm atá ar an bhaile sin
result.orig: Cén t-ainm atá ar an bhaile sin
result.html: Cén t-ainm atá ar an bhaile sinWhat is that town called?
result.ponchtml: Cén t-ainm atá ar an ḃaile sinWhat is that town called?

result.eng: This is my native town.
result.ga: Seo é mo bhaile dúchais
result.orig: Seo é mo bhaile dúchais
result.html: Seo é mo bhaile dúchaisThis is my native town.
result.ponchtml: Seo é mo ḃaile dúċaisThis is my native town.

result.eng: I live outside town.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí taobh amuigh den bhaile
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí taobh amuigh den bhaile
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí taobh amuigh den bhaileI live outside town.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí taoḃ amuiġ den ḃaileI live outside town.

result.eng: There's a supermarket and a couple of factories in Indreabhán, but it isn't [what you would call] a town yet.
result.ga: Tá ollmhargadh agus cúpla monarcha in Indreabhán ach ní baile fós é
result.orig: Tá ollmhargadh agus cúpla monarcha in Indreabhán ach ní baile fós é
result.html: Tá ollmhargadh agus cúpla monarcha in Indreabhán ach ní baile fós éThere's a supermarket and a couple of factories in Indreabhán, but it isn't [what you would call] a town yet.
result.ponchtml: Tá ollṁargaḋ agus cúpla monarċa in Indreaḃán aċ ní baile fós éThere's a supermarket and a couple of factories in Indreabhán, but it isn't [what you would call] a town yet.

result.eng: It's a small town.
result.ga: Is baile beag é
result.orig: Is baile beag é
result.html: Is baile beag éIt's a small town.
result.ponchtml: Is baile beag éIt's a small town.

result.eng: All the people of the town will be there.
result.ga: Beidh muintir an bhaile uilig ann
result.orig: Beidh muintir an bhaile uilig ann
result.html: Beidh muintir an bhaile uilig annAll the people of the town will be there.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muintir an ḃaile uilig annAll the people of the town will be there.

result.eng: I live in a small town.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beagI live in a small town.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí i mbaile beagI live in a small town.

result.eng: I'm living in a small town in County Kildare these days.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag i gContae Chill Dara na laethanta seo
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag i gContae Chill Dara na laethanta seo
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag i gContae Chill Dara na laethanta seoI'm living in a small town in County Kildare these days.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí i mbaile beag i gContae Ċill Dara na laeṫanta seoI'm living in a small town in County Kildare these days.

result.eng: Do you like the town?
result.ga: An maith leat an baile
result.orig: An maith leat an baile
result.html: An maith leat an baileDo you like the town?
result.ponchtml: An maiṫ leat an baileDo you like the town?

result.eng: That town is beside Galway city, isn't it?
result.ga: Tá an baile sin in aice le cathair na Gaillimhe nach bhfuil
result.orig: Tá an baile sin in aice le cathair na Gaillimhe nach bhfuil
result.html: Tá an baile sin in aice le cathair na Gaillimhe nach bhfuilThat town is beside Galway city, isn't it?
result.ponchtml: Tá an baile sin in aice le caṫair na Gailliṁe naċ ḃfuilThat town is beside Galway city, isn't it?

result.eng: It's on the edge of town.
result.ga: Tá sé ar imeall an bhaile
result.orig: Tá sé ar imeall an bhaile
result.html: Tá sé ar imeall an bhaileIt's on the edge of town.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ar imeall an ḃaileIt's on the edge of town.

result.eng: It's in the centre of town.
result.ga: Tá sé i lár an bhaile
result.orig: Tá sé i lár an bhaile
result.html: Tá sé i lár an bhaileIt's in the centre of town.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé i lár an ḃaileIt's in the centre of town.

result.eng: It's in that new estate on the edge of town: Riverside.
result.ga: Tá sé san eastát nua sin ar imeall an bhaile Cois Abhann
result.orig: Tá sé san eastát nua sin ar imeall an bhaile Cois Abhann
result.html: Tá sé san eastát nua sin ar imeall an bhaile Cois AbhannIt's in that new estate on the edge of town: Riverside.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé san eastát nua sin ar imeall an ḃaile Cois AḃannIt's in that new estate on the edge of town: Riverside.

result.eng: It's near the centre of town, beside the shopping centre.
result.ga: Tá sé gar do lár an bhaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireachta
result.orig: Tá sé gar do lár an bhaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireachta
result.html: Tá sé gar do lár an bhaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireachtaIt's near the centre of town, beside the shopping centre.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé gar do lár an ḃaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireaċtaIt's near the centre of town, beside the shopping centre.

result.eng: She is the talk of the town.
result.ga: Tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaile
result.orig: Tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaile
result.html: Tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaileShe is the talk of the town.
result.ponchtml: Tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaileShe is the talk of the town.

result.eng: A town with more canals than streets.
result.ga: Baile ar mhó líon na gcanálacha ná líon na sráideanna
result.orig: Baile ar mhó líon na gcanálacha ná líon na sráideanna
result.html: Baile ar mhó líon na gcanálacha ná líon na sráideannaA town with more canals than streets.
result.ponchtml: Baile ar ṁó líon na gcanálaċa ná líon na sráideannaA town with more canals than streets.

result.eng: They live in a town called Sobotka.
result.ga: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm Sobotka
result.orig: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm Sobotka
result.html: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm SobotkaThey live in a town called Sobotka.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm SobotkaThey live in a town called Sobotka.

result.eng: The Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ga: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.orig: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.html: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an ċogaiḋ agus cónaí orṫu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.

result.eng: Before them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ga: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.orig: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.html: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ponchtml: Baile beag suaraċ ocraċ beadaí a ḃí amaċ rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.

result.eng: You will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ga: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.orig: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.html: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ponchtml: Muirfear ṫú aċ tú ag gaḃáil 'un an ḃaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.
